snippet.title: Apollyon: River of Life - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Apollyon is a single or multiplayer choose your own adventure RPG, with occult elements, meaningful choices, strategy, and extensive lore. 

It is released upon Steam with 20+ hours of playtime, with post-launch content on the way, totally free to those who own Apollyon.

It is $10 for the launch week, starting today!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1472060/Apollyon_River_of_Life/
